explanation: [0-0] A man with short black hair, wearing a light gray short-sleeved T-shirt, is holding a cigarette in his right hand, looking down at it. The background is blurred.

In the upper right corner of the screen, a person is standing indoors. At the bottom of the screen are the English words "Normal vs. Smokers" and a lung icon.
